Acha product hai lena chaho to lelo socho mt or bhai mene dar dar k liya tha qki sahi review ni mil rahe the merko but honestly acha hai go for it.Thank you MIVI merko 22thousand k bluetooth k mic me wo clearity ni mili jo 999 k neck band me mil gayi

Name: AjayKumar sharma
Review:
Worst products do not purchase


Bahut hi jyada ghatiya product ghatiya service Hai mivi product.Mera product kharab ho gaya tha aur Maine service center Mein Diya Tha Hyderabad mein abhi Ek Mahina Ho Gaya Hai Magar ab tak mera product mujhe nahin mila . Call Centre mein phone karke email dalkar koi reply nahi aata. Overall pure India mein Unka ek hi service center hai vah bhi Hyderabad mein. Jab Bhi call center mein phone karo to ek hi baat bolate Hain Sar aapka product repairing Kiya ja raha.hai.Yah product mat lo and do not purchase literally Rogue baad mein aur pachtaoge
